draw_connected_2d:
draw_connected_2d(numPoints: number) → {CurvePlotFunction}

Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line.
draw_connected_3d:
draw_connected_3d(numPoints: number) → {CurvePlotFunction}

Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points and connecting each pair with a line.
draw_points_2d:
draw_points_2d(numPoints: number) → {CurvePlotFunction}

Returns a function that turns a given Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. When a program evaluates to a Drawing, the Source system displays it graphically, in a window,

*
draw_points_3d:
draw_points_3d(numPoints: number) → {CurvePlotFunction}

Returns a function that turns a given 3D Curve into a Drawing, by sampling the 3D Curve at num sample points. The Drawing consists of isolated points, and does not connect them. When a program evaluates to a Drawing, the Source system displays it graphically, in a window,

*
draw_sound_2d:
draw_sound_2d(sound: Sound) → {void}

Visualizes the sound on a 2d line graph
new_plot:
new_plot(data: ListOfPairs) → {void}

Adds a new plotly plot to the context which will be rendered in the Plotly Tabs
new_plot_json:
new_plot_json(data: any) → {void}

Adds a new plotly plot to the context which will be rendered in the Plotly Tabs
